author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: towards bug #34: added NakedObjectSpecification#getDefaultValue() so that (in particular) can request a default value for action parameter
which are not annotated with @Optional when invoking their validateXxx or other supporting methods.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: more on ExtensionHolder so that the JavaIntrospector can populate the extensions for the peers (including JavaActionParam as peer impl or ActionParamPeer).

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: created ActionParamPeer - ActionImpl et al now eagerly creates parameters which delegate to corresponding ActionParamPeer; more on ExtensionHolder.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: created ExtensionHolder to represent #getExtensions() and #getExtension(Class); NakedObjectFeature & NakedObjectSpecification now extend.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: created ExtensionHolder to represent #getExtensions() and #getExtension(Class); NakedObjectFeature & NakedObjectSpecification now extend.
